entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
